nodes.text: The Ranoraki family was an affluent family that lived on the planet Hetzal Prime in a large walled compound. When the Great Hyperspace Disaster threatened the Hetzal system, the Ranorakis had their guards hold off a crowd of civilians that attempted to gain access to their large starship so they could escape the system, causing a knot of conflict sensed by Jedi Master Loden Greatstorm and his Padawan Bell Zettifar.
